name: Ken Ewers

topics.response_text: We aren't talking any more. Get out!

topics.topic_text: Any help you can provide would be appreciated.
topics.response_text: Well, all I can do is offer my repair services to you. I'm pretty good with fixing stuff.

topics.topic_text: Calm down, pal, before I put a hole in your chest.
topics.response_text: Look, "pal,", there is no way you're going to get to me or my wife so just back on out of here!

topics.topic_text: Whoa, whoa, whoa.... Take it easy.
topics.response_text: Yeah right, and the second I drop my guard you pounce. No thanks.

topics.topic_text: Why are you being so hostile?
topics.response_text: Maybe it's because my wife has gone mental. No wait, I think it's because some lunatics are trying to kill us.

topics.topic_text: Your wife let me in... something about a catalog?
What the hell is your problem?
topics.response_text: Do you understand English? I said get out!

topics.topic_text: Look, I'm not here to hurt anyone, I swear.
topics.response_text: All I care about are two things. My life and my wife's life. Beyond that, I don't give two shits.

topics.topic_text: Evan King told me to check on you. Is everything okay?
topics.response_text: We're great. Just peachy. I love sitting in my house with my thumb up my ass.

topics.topic_text: So, what's your take on Evan King?
topics.response_text: Well, he's town mayor or sheriff or whatever he calls himself. He calls all the shots.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for Ian West. Have you seen him?
topics.response_text: Nope. Everyone stays inside, except Evan King of course.

topics.topic_text: Did you know the Wests are dead?
topics.response_text: Son of a bitch! I knew the Family were going to cross the line. It was only a matter of time.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me more about what's been going on around here?
topics.response_text: Everyone is keeping themselves safe from the Family. If I was you, I'd do the same.

topics.topic_text: What do you think about the Family?
topics.response_text: They're lowlife scum who decided to use Arefu as their own personal amusement park. Oh, they're a fun bunch.

description:
Ken Ewers is a 45 year-old Caucasian Male.

Ken Ewers is a middle-aged resident of Arefu who lives with his wife, Brailee. He appears worn down by the hardships of post-apocalyptic life, with tired eyes and a permanent scowl. Despite his gruff exterior, he clearly cares deeply for his wife and is terrified of the dangers that threaten their small community.

Ken Ewers's Personality: Ken is short-tempered and gruff with strangers, often providing only minimal information. His intimidating demeanor masks deep-seated fear about the attacks on Arefu. He's fiercely protective of Brailee, to the point of being possessive, and follows Evan King's leadership despite his personal doubts about the lockdown strategy.

Ken Ewers's Backstory: Ken Ewers was born and raised in Arefu, a small settlement in the Capital Wasteland. Before the current crisis, he lived a relatively quiet life with his wife Brailee. The recent attacks by The Family, combined with the general hardships of life in the wasteland, have taken a severe toll on his mental state. His wife's deteriorating mental condition has only increased his anxiety and protective instincts.
